alert.note: Alert for Brevard (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued November 16 at 8:21PM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of east central Florida, including the following county, Brevard. * WHEN...Until 1015 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 820 PM EST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 2 and 5 inches of rain have fallen. - Portions of Palm Bay are also under a Flood Warning. Flooding of roads has been reported in Southeast Palm Bay. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Palm Bay, Malabar and West Melbourne. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
